languages.text: "Мы извлекли уроки из недавних событий. А если кто-то не извлек — я позабочусь о том, чтобы вы лично могли вздернуть этих непонятливых ребят по возвращении".
"We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."
languages.original_text: "Мы извлекли уроки из недавних событий. А если кто-то не извлек — я позабочусь о том, чтобы вы лично могли вздернуть этих непонятливых ребят по возвращении".

traits.locale_text: "We've learned our lessons from the recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those ne'er-do-wells once you're back."
"We've learned our lessons from the recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those ne'er-do-wells once you're back."
"We've learned our lessons from the recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted guys once you're back."
"We've learned our lessons from the recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted guys once you're back."
"We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."
"We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

languages.text: “最近发生的这些事情，我们都从中吸取了教训。至于那些没有吸取教训的家伙，就等你回来亲自收拾那群蠢货吧。”
languages.original_text: "We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

traits.locale_text: “最近发生的这些事情，我们都从中吸取了教训。至于那些没有吸取教训的家伙，就等您回来亲自收拾那群蠢货吧。”

languages.text: 「最近の出来事から、十分学びましたよ。そしてまだ分かっていない奴らには、あなたが戻って来た時頭の悪いバカどもを締め上げれるよう、手配しておきます」
languages.original_text: "We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

traits.locale_text: 「最近の出来事から、十分学びましたよ。そしてまだ分かっていない奴らには、あなたが戻って来た時頭の悪い連中を締め上げれるよう、手配しておきます」

languages.text: «Hemos aprendido la lección después de los acontecimientos recientes. En cuanto a los que no lo han hecho, me encargaré de que pueda colgar personalmente a esos catetos en cuanto vuelva».
languages.original_text: "We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos aprendido la lección después de los acontecimientos recientes. En cuanto a los que no lo han hecho, me encargaré de que pueda colgar personalmente a esos catetos en cuanto vuelva».

languages.text: "Wir haben unsere Lektion aus den jüngsten Ereignissen gelernt. Und was jene angeht, die das nicht haben ... Ich sorge dafür, dass Ihr diese Dummköpfe persönlich aufknüpfen könnt, wenn Ihr zurück seid."
languages.original_text: "We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben unsere Lektion aus den jüngsten Ereignissen gelernt. Und was jene angeht, die das nicht haben ... Ich sorge dafür, dass Ihr diese Dummköpfe persönlich aufknüpfen könnt, wenn Ihr zurück seid."

languages.text: « Les récents événements nous ont servi de leçon. Quant aux abrutis qui ne l'auraient pas retenue, je veillerai à ce que vous puissiez personnellement les envoyer à la potence à votre retour. »
languages.original_text: "We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

traits.locale_text: « Les récents événements nous ont servi de leçon. Quant aux abrutis qui ne l'auraient pas retenue, je veillerai à ce que vous puissiez personnellement les envoyer à la potence à votre retour. »

languages.text: "Son yaşanan olaylardan sonra dersimizi aldık. Derslerini almayanlar konusunda ise... Kafası yavaş çalışan o tipleri geri döndüğünüzde bizzat asabilmenizi sağlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "We've learned our lessons from recent events. And as for those who haven't learned theirs, I'll see to it that you can personally string up those slow-witted fools once you're back."

traits.locale_text: "Son yaşanan olaylardan sonra dersimizi aldık. Derslerini almayanlar konusunda ise... Kafası yavaş çalışan o tipleri geri döndüğünüzde bizzat asabilmenizi sağlayacağım."
